contextWindowSize.description: Optional context window size (in characters) for window expansion techniques

segmentMaxChars.description: Optional maximum size (in characters) for stitched relevant segments

semanticChunking.description: When true, ingestion prefers semantic (paragraph-based) chunking

compressionMaxChars.description: Optional maximum size (in characters) for compressed context

questionsPerChunk.description: Optional number of synthetic questions to generate per chunk

documentTitles.description: Optional whitelist of document filenames to ingest from dataPath
